ALL TRADE INS WELCOME AND WE OFFER NATIONWIDE DELIVERY

Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included

We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles

SONET 1.0T DCT EX+
Absolutely stunning 2022 Sonet in excellent condition. Central locking, aircon, airbags, electric mirrors and windows. Radio with bluetooth and USB ports to charge and connect your phone. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. adjustable seats that consist of a red touch to it. Reverse camera and sensors for parking assistance. Automatic transmission that allows for a smooth and comfortable drive. Visit your trusted KIA Konfidence dealership in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive to indulge your transport needs and desires. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.
